headline: The Dow Is on Fire This Year. What Ignited the Gains.
summary: Through midday trading on Friday, the blue-chip index was up about 3% year to date, ahead of the  by almost 6 percentage points.  The two best stocks in the Dow this year have been  Caterpillar  and  Honeywell  makers of heavy machinery and aerospace parts, among other things.

headline: IBM’s Claude Code Shock Tests Confidence In Mainframe And AI Transition
summary: IBM (NYSE:IBM) saw its sharpest single day stock drop in over 25 years after Anthropic launched Claude Code, an AI tool aimed at automating COBOL system modernization. The news sparked broad debate about how AI tools could affect IBM's long standing mainframe and consulting work tied to legacy COBOL applications. IBM is responding with its own modernization offerings and partnerships, as investors reassess the durability of a key revenue pillar. IBM shares recently closed at $242.01,...
